body_html:
After some further discussion, I don't think this is something we're going to pursue---an unrolled list like that is functionally a multipage hidden index on every page, which isn't really useful as left navigation, and (as noted above) won't scale as we add more packages.

The API landing page has an entire index and comments available for text search, and we're working on ways to make site search more accurate. I'm going to close this issue, however.

body:
After some further discussion, I don't think this is something we're going to pursue---an unrolled list like that is functionally a multipage hidden index on every page, which isn't really useful as left navigation, and (as noted above) won't scale as we add more packages.

The API landing page has an entire index and comments available for text search, and we're working on ways to make site search more accurate.  I'm going to close this issue, however.
